00019 #ifndef _IPL98_IMAGEROWIT1BP_H
00020 #define _IPL98_IMAGEROWIT1BP_H
00021 
00022 #include "ipl98_types.h"
00023 #include "../kernel_c/image/kernel_functions.h"
00024 
00025 namespace ipl{ // use namespace if C++
00026 
00037 class CImageRowIterator1bp
00038 {
00043         class CIntermediateType
00044         {
00046                 UINT8** m_ppBegin;
00048                 unsigned int* m_pCurr;
00049                 public:
00051                 inline CIntermediateType(unsigned int* pCurr, UINT8** ppBegin):m_pCurr(pCurr),m_ppBegin(ppBegin){}
00053                 inline CIntermediateType& operator=(const CIntermediateType& Obj){*m_ppBegin=*Obj.m_ppBegin;*m_pCurr=*Obj.m_pCurr;return *this;}
00059                 inline CIntermediateType& operator=(UINT32 Color){(Color ? (*(*m_ppBegin+(*m_pCurr>>3)) |= (0x80>>(*m_pCurr%8))) : (*(*m_ppBegin+(*m_pCurr>>3)) &= (0xff7f>>((*m_pCurr%8)))));return *this;};
00067                 inline operator UINT32(){return ((*(*m_ppBegin+(*m_pCurr>>3))) & (0x80>>(*m_pCurr%8)) )!=0;}
00069                 inline const UINT32 operator[](UINT32 i){return ((*(*m_ppBegin+((*m_pCurr+i)>>3))) & (0x80>>((*m_pCurr+i)%8)) )!=0;}
00070         };
00071 protected: // attributes
00073     unsigned int m_Curr;
00075         UINT8* m_pBegin;
00077         unsigned int m_End;
00080         CIntermediateType m_IntermediateType;
00081 public:
00087         inline CImageRowIterator1bp(UINT8* pActualRow, UINT32 StartIndex, UINT32 MaxIndex);
00089         inline CImageRowIterator1bp& operator=(const CImageRowIterator1bp& It);
00092         inline CImageRowIterator1bp End() const;
00097         inline CImageRowIterator1bp& operator++() { m_Curr++; return *this; }
00099         inline CIntermediateType& operator*(){return m_IntermediateType;}
00101         inline const UINT32 operator[](UINT32 i) {return m_IntermediateType[i];}
00104         inline friend bool operator==(const CImageRowIterator1bp& p, const CImageRowIterator1bp& q);
00107         inline friend bool operator!=(const CImageRowIterator1bp& p, const CImageRowIterator1bp& q);
00110         inline friend bool operator< (const CImageRowIterator1bp& p, const CImageRowIterator1bp& q);
00111 };
00112 
00113 inline CImageRowIterator1bp::CImageRowIterator1bp(UINT8* pActualRow, UINT32 StartIndex, UINT32 MaxIndex):
00114                 m_End(MaxIndex), m_Curr(StartIndex%8),
00115                 m_pBegin(pActualRow+(StartIndex>>3)), m_IntermediateType(&m_Curr,&m_pBegin)
00116 {
00117 }
00118 
00119 inline CImageRowIterator1bp& CImageRowIterator1bp::operator=(const CImageRowIterator1bp& It)
00120 {
00121         m_Curr  = It.m_Curr;
00122         m_pBegin = It.m_pBegin;
00123         m_End   = It.m_End;
00124         m_IntermediateType = It.m_IntermediateType;
00125         return *this;
00126 }
00127 
00128 inline CImageRowIterator1bp CImageRowIterator1bp::End() const
00129 {
00130         CImageRowIterator1bp t = *this;
00131         t.m_Curr = m_End;
00132         return t;
00133 }
00134 
00135 inline bool operator==(const CImageRowIterator1bp& p, const CImageRowIterator1bp& q)
00136 {
00137         return (p.m_Curr==q.m_Curr);
00138 }
00139 
00140 inline bool operator!=(const CImageRowIterator1bp& p, const CImageRowIterator1bp& q)
00141 {
00142         return !(p==q);
00143 }
00144 
00145 inline bool operator<(const CImageRowIterator1bp& p, const CImageRowIterator1bp& q)
00146 {
00147         return (p.m_Curr<q.m_Curr);
00148 }
00149 
00150 } // end namespace ipl
